item.title: Concord™
item.description:
Title: Concord™
Genre: Action
Developer: Firewalk Studios
Publisher: PlayStation Publishing LLC
Franchise: PlayStation Studios
Release Date: Aug 23, 2024




About This Game

Edition includes:
  • Concord™

Assemble your crew of Freegunner space outlaws and team up online with friends for thrilling 5v5 PVP modes across the galaxy in Concord.

Concord is a new team-based first-person shooter for PS5® and PC*. Handpick your personal roster of Freegunners from the crew of the Northstar – a group of outlaws and adventurers working as guns-for-hire.

ASSEMBLE YOUR CREW


From powerful mystics to skilled gunslingers and helpful healers, each Freegunner brings their own unique skills, personality, and abilities that cater to a wide-range of playstyles.

Create your own custom squads of Freegunners with Crew Builder to bring an arsenal of different role types to the match or focus on your favourite characters to master their gameplay and unlock unique modifiers, cosmetics, background lore, and more – you decide when to play your characters and how you impact the match.

PLAY. PROGRESS. PERSONALIZE.


Earn and unlock a wide range of character customization items and learn more about the characters, worlds, and factions in the Concord Galaxy with the Galactic Guide.

You’ll also be able to progress toward and unlock Freegunner Variants—versions of each of the 16 Freegunners with added Combat Trait modifiers to their base abilities. As you learn and master the characters, Combat Traits empower you to tailor each character to your playstyle.

MODES FOR EVERY MOOD


With an array of objective and respawn-based modes with emphasis on teamplay, Concord has six different PVP modes that let you determine the level of challenge you are looking for.

NORTHSTAR CREW STORIES


As your journey in Concord unfolds, so will the stories of the Northstar crew. Each week, you will be greeted by new cinematic vignettes that deliver ongoing narratives that expand upon the characters and their adventures.

AN EXPANDING UNIVERSE


Alongside a day-one lineup of 16 playable Freegunners, six PVP modes, and 12 maps, the crew of the Northstar and the galaxy of Concord will grow through regular post-launch updates that introduce new Freegunners, Variant traits, game modes, maps and worlds, and weekly cinematic vignettes for no additional cost.

BUILT FOR PS5 AND PC


Team up with friends across both PlayStation®5 consoles and PC with seamless online cross-play support.


*PlayStation Network Account required, subject to the PlayStation Terms of Services and User Agreement .



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (Creators Update)
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K or AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 35 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (Creators Update)
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 Super or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 35 GB available space

item.title: Galaxy Burger
item.description:
Title: Galaxy Burger
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation
Developer: Galactic Workshop
Publisher: Galactic Workshop
Franchise: Galaxy Pass Universe
Release Date: Aug 23, 2024




About This Game


Create perfect burgers using a variety of ingredients, design your own recipes, and delight your customers! Craft a variety of burgers—whether large or small, vegan, fish-based, with eggs, on black bread, or even without any bread!




Play solo or in co-op mode for 2-8 players. Gather friends and family around the kitchen table to whip up fast food together. Work in harmony to enhance speed and quality. Assign roles: who will make the burgers, who will handle the drinks, and who will manage the orders.




Expect quirky customers including aliens, cats, and others with unique tastes! Cater to their unique tastes and serve up their favorites as swiftly as you can.




Discover new ingredients for burgers and other fast foods, including drinks. Explore the galaxy and encounter a host of unique visitors at your burger shop.




There's more than just burgers! Serve a variety of drinks—juices, sodas, and iced coffee—and fry up some fries, calamari, and onion rings.

✨ P.S.

Galaxy Burger was inspired by games like "Good Pizza, Great Pizza", "Papa's Games", "Overcooked", "Plate Up" and more. We, a team of enthusiasts, love space and delicious food. Do you?

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2749770/Galaxy_Burger/?utm_source=self_bottom_en



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7 64bit or later
    • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8600 GS / ATI Radeon HD 3470
    • DirectX: Version 9.0c
    • Storage: 750 MB available space
    • Additional Notes: Minimum 1280x720 screen resolution
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

item.title: Tunnel Escape
item.description:
Title: Tunnel Escape
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , RPG
Developer: Elzee
Publisher: Saikey Studios
Franchise: Saikey Studios
Release Date: Aug 22, 2024




About This Game





Tunnel Escape is a rogue-lite exploration RPG/ADV set in a city infected by a zombie virus. It combines action and strategy in a fusion of intense gunplay with turn-based combat, item crafting and a deep skill system. Each bullet shot, each grenade thrown and each step taken will count towards failure or success.

EXPLORE THE UNDERGROUND LABORATORY


On the run from the spreading infection in the city, Beatrice discovers the entrance to a secret biological laboratory. Documents mention the existence of a successfully developed vaccine, sending her on a journey deep into the complex as she becomes humanity’s last hope.

UTILIZE AN ARSENAL OF WEAPONS AND SKILLS


Beatrice will need to defend herself from the dangers lurking below. Unlock unique guns, each with their own benefits and downsides; use throwables to blast enemies into pieces, blind them, stun them or set them all on fire. Even a strong kick to the face can turn the tide of battle in your favor - time to unleash the power of high-heels in close-quarters-combat!

In addition to raw weapon power, Beatrice can learn hundreds of different skills. Every gun has its own set of active skills, for example unlocking the potential of rapid fire for the pistol, using birdshot to hit all enemies at once with the shotgun, or emptying an entire magazine into the undead horde in one go with the automatic rifle. Supplemented by a huge number of passive skills for offense and defense, Beatrice gets access to a growing number of strategic options.

FIGHT UNIQUE ENEMIES AND BOSS BATTLES


Zombies are far from the only threat roaming the massive, interconnected facility. Dozens of strange abominations can be encountered, from mutated creatures, infested animals and living plants to weaponized machinery and many more. Every stage features a unique selection of enemies, complete with a boss battle at the end. Defeating a stage boss will require clever use of strategy, learning the enemies’ weaknesses and utilizing the right skills at the right time.

ENJOY HANDCRAFTED ART AND ANIMATIONS


Every animation was crafted by use of traditional techniques, with every frame and variation of motion having been carefully hand-drawn and manually refined.

Beatrice’s facial expressions, subtle bodily movements, particle effects and voice overs for every event are meticulously controlled through scripting.

ENCOUNTER RANDOM EVENTS: EVERY RUN IS DIFFERENT


Meet other characters, open chests with valuable loot, buy stat-altering drinks at vending machines, water strange plants (at your own risk) and defeat thieving little rodents among many other events that can be encountered at random. No two runs will be the same as Beatrice needs to adapt to beneficial and dangerous encounters alike.

CRAFTING SYSTEM


Unlock crafting to combine items into new or stronger ones. Recovery items and ammunition for a secret weapon can be assembled whenever you are not in an active battle. Plan ahead of time to make sure you have the edge in combat when you need it the most.

PICK YOUR DIFFICULTY


Different difficulty settings allow players of all skill levels to enjoy the game. Whether you play for the story or the challenge, the rogue-lite system of earning permanent upgrades will make the game easier even after failed attempts - and for those seeking the hardest challenge: Beatrice’s level can be lowered in the later game for that extra dose of difficulty.

FULL CONTROLLER SUPPORT AND FORCE FEEDBACK


In addition to keyboard controls, every part of the game has full controller support. Furthermore, detailed force feedback simulates hits, kicks, shots and blasts, creating a tactile experience for every action. We recommend giving controller vibration a try for the highest level of immersion.

For an especially comfortable experience: The game was designed for effortless navigation with just one hand. Left, right or both hands, the control scheme allows you to play the way you desire.



Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work:

Violence, drugs, self-harm, and General Mature Content.



System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
    • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Storage: 1700 MB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
    • Processor: Intel i7 7700 or higher
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Storage: 1700 MB available space

item.title: Skull and Bones
item.description:
Title: Skull and Bones
Genre: Action , Adventure
Developer: Ubisoft Singapore
Publisher: Ubisoft
Release Date: Aug 22, 2024




About This Game

ENGAGE IN SPECTACULAR NAVAL COMBAT

Prepare for devastating battles by crafting a dozen different ships and equip your fleet with powerful loadouts. Unlock stronger weapons as you progress and customize your ships to reflect your unique pirate playstyle.

SAIL INTO A DANGEROUS HELL IN PARADISE

Voyage into the Indian Ocean and explore a vast open world teeming with cutthroat pirates, deadly sea monsters, supernatural threats, devastating storms, and more.

TEAM UP WITH FELLOW PIRATES

Sail the lawless seas solo or team up with two friends or other players to partake in shareable contracts and rewards.

ENJOY EVER-EVOLVING CONTENT

Each season, face a brand-new legendary sea lord and discover fresh content, limitless endgame opportunities, and new exciting features designed to enhance your pirate experience.


Persistent internet connection and Ubisoft account required.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel i7 4790 AMD Ryzen5 1600
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 5500 8GB
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 65 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or Windows 11 (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel i7 8700k AMD Ryzen5 3600
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070 8GB or AMD RX 5700XT 8GB
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 65 GB available space

item.title: Tactical Breach Wizards
item.description:
Title: Tactical Breach Wizards
Genre: Adventure , Indie , RPG , Strategy
Developer: Suspicious Developments Inc
Publisher: Suspicious Developments
Franchise: The Defenestration Trilogy
Release Date: Aug 22, 2024




About This Game

Tactical Breach Wizards is a turn-based tactics game in which you lead a team of renegade wizards in kevlar, as they unravel a modern conspiracy plot and/or find the most stylish way to punch a Traffic Warlock through a 4th story window.

It's a story-driven campaign of about 14 hours, in which you...

Combo spells for satisfying results

Each of your wizards has a unique set of abilities, from a straightforward lightning bolt to transforming into a rabid dog.

Experiment freely, rewind your mistakes

When you hit a tricky situation, try every wild idea you have - you can always rewind if it didn't pan out. It could work beautifully, fail spectacularly, or screw up in a way that gives you new ideas. Either way, free rewinds mean you play it out in-game instead of scratching your head.

Fight the (various) power(s)

Your team are a motley crew of misfits on the wrong side of the law, fighting against:

  • The Rushwater PD and their rising star: Steve Clark, the Traffic Warlock
  • An oppressive religious dictatorship who rule the streets with Riot Priests
  • A private military corporation meddling with magic to enhance their troops
  • And the most deadly operative the trade has ever seen: the Black Ops Chronomancer

Upgrade your magical arsenal

Every ability for every wizard has a set of unique perks to unlock as they level up, tailoring their powers to your playstyle, and enabling ridiculous ways they can combo with each other.

Get to know these loveable idiots

Travel the world, meet interesting wizards, and find out what's wrong with them. Each of your team has their own personal struggles, and between missions you can choose how much to dig into them, overcome them, and guide these oddballs to become friends.

Unravel a conspiracy, stop a war

As the enemy plot thickens, key players and their relationships are added to your conspiracy map to keep track of the important bits. You can read more about anything you're fuzzy on, arrange them in a way that makes sense to you, and keep a visual overview of what's going on.

Build confidence to wear fancier outfits

Each character already owns all their unlockable outfits - they just don't have the confidence to wear them. Characters earn confidence by accomplishing optional extra objectives that reflect their strengths and values.

Fine-tune the difficulty

We want everyone to be able to finish the game, so as well as Easy, Medium & Hard modes, you can customise each variable individually for the kind of challenge you like.

What is it not?

As always, we don't want you to buy the game if it's not for you. Here are some things it isn't!

  • It's not a branching story. You do make choices in your conversations, but they don't cause major deviations in the course of the plot. They're more about deciding how you want this character to treat people, and how much you want to dig into or push back at what the other person is saying.
  • It's not a roguelike. Every now and then someone will call it that and we don't know why! Every level is handcrafted.
  • It's not XCOM. This is a much shorter, story-driven experience about a cast of unique characters. There's no base-building or equivalent.
  • It's not Into the Breach. This is more forgiving, but the ceiling on how many different things you can do in a turn is higher.

What is it?

Come on, we just went over this with gifs and everything.



Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

The game has a stylised rather than realistic look, but people sure do get shot, struck, slammed into walls, smashed through windows, set on fire, etc. There is a little stylised blood.

The closest thing you have to a healer is a necromancer who needs to kill the patient before she can bring them back to life at full health. Not sure where that falls in all this.

The plot features a fictional illegal drug prominently. Use of it is not encouraged nor directly depicted.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7
    • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700 2.6 GHz or AMD Phenom 9950 Quad Core 2.6 GHz
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 1GB ATI Radeon HD 5770, 1GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or better
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 3 GB available space
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
